resources.string: Unable to delete language while in use. To delete, deselect check box.
Show predicted text for easier and more accurate text input. The device will learn your writing style and update words every week.
To see more options, turn on predictive text.
Swipe keyboard horizontally to switch between letters and symbols.
Show a big character bubble when a key on a Qwerty keyboard is tapped.
Enable Predictive text to use Auto spacing.
Insert a full stop followed by a space automatically by tapping the space bar twice.
Automatically capitalize the first letter of each sentence.
Show voice entry button on keyboard.
To see advanced options, turn on handwriting.
Recommend complete words based on characters entered so far.
Enter text by sliding finger across keyboard. This feature is optimized for Qwerty keyboard.
Enable Predictive text to use Continuous input.
Using continuous input will turn off cursor control.
Slide your finger across the keyboard to move the text cursor.
Using cursor control will turn off continuous input.
Flick upwards on a key to view symbols and alternative characters.
Display full screen handwriting in S Note and Messaging
Continuous input is unavailable. Predictive text has been disabled.
Using the keyboard swipe will turn off continuous input.
Using continuous input will turn off the keyboard swipe.
Show the handwriting pad when the S Pen is detected.
Show the handwriting pad when the S Pen is detected.
To change the language, swipe horizontally across the space bar.
Set your keyboard for use with one hand.

When one-handed operation is selected, you can adjust the Samsung keyboard by tapping the arrow buttons on either side in Portrait mode. This feature is available on the dialing keypad, call screen, Calculator and unlock pattern screen.

When one-handed operation is selected, you can adjust the Samsung keyboard by tapping the arrow buttons on either side in Portrait mode. You can turn on or off this feature on the keyboard directly using pinch zoom.
This feature is available on the dialing keypad, call screen, Calculator, and unlock pattern screen.
Pinch close on keyboard area to change keyboard type.
Press and hold with two fingers, then drag to move keyboards
If personalized data is turned on, Samsung keyboard can learn your writing style, from Facebook, Gmail, Twitter, Messaging, and Contacts, and offer predictions and corrections tailored to you.
Keyboard settings, except the my word list and the auto substitution list, will be reset.
Keyboard settings, except personalized data, will be reset.
All keyboard settings will be reset to their defaults. Downloaded languages will not be deleted.
Not enough space in device storage. Delete some files and try again.
Maximum number of supported languages (%d) reached.
Language list updated. %d new languages added.
Language list updated. 1 new language added.
Language list updated. No new languages added.
"Allow some of %s's features to use network connections and access the following data:"
Allow %s to access the following data:
%s needs to use network connections to work normally. Allow?
Data will be transferred in the background when the device is connected to a mobile network or WLAN.
Samsung keyboard can learn entered text to enhance auto replacement and provide better prediction results. This excludes security information, such as passwords and credit card numbers.

"Samsung keyboard can store all of the text you enter, except passwords and numbers, in order to give better prediction results. Continue? If you do not want your personal data to be stored, go to keyboard settings and turn off personalized data."
‘%s’ will be removed from learned words.
Your device can learn your writing style and predict what you want to type. These predictions will only be stored on your device, unless you sync them with your Samsung account.
Tap OK to use this feature. If you do not want your personal data to be stored, go to keyboard settings and uncheck personalized data.

A new language is now available. Update your language list by downloading the new language. Tap OK to update now. You can also update by tapping the More button and selecting Update. Note that downloading via mobile networks may result in additional charges depending on your payment plan.
Connecting to mobile networks may result in additional charges.
Log in to Facebook to let your device learn your writing style.
Log in to Gmail to let your device learn your writing style.
Log in to Twitter to let your device learn your writing style.
Log in to let your device learn your Weibo style.
Allow the device to learn your writing style from your messages.
Allow the device to use the information saved in Contacts.
Complete or replace the word you are typing with the most probable word when you tap the space bar or a punctuation mark.
Complete or replace the word you are typing with the most probable word when you tap the space bar.
To turn on auto replacement, turn on at least 1 language.
Enable Predictive text to use Auto replacement.
Auto replace in Korean only available while using Qwerty keyboard.
Underline spelling errors in red and suggest corrections.
To turn on Auto check spelling, select at least one language.
Set your device to update your predictive text with popular new words every week.
Set your device to use the personal language data you have entered to improve your prediction results.
To update your language data, you need to connect to a network. Connecting via Mobile data may result in additional charges depending on your payment plan.
Set your device to suggest emoji based on the characters you have entered.
"Personalization services are provided by a third party service provider. Service provider's Privacy Policy is applied."
Your remote data has been cleared.
Failed to personalize keyboard using %1$s. Try again.
Failed to clear your remote data. Try again.
Your personal language data has been cleared.
Error occurred while clearing your personal language data. Try again.
Failed to personalize keyboard using %1$s. Try later.
Unable to personalize data. You are not connected to mobile networks. Connect to a Wi-Fi network instead.
Data submitted. Check notifications to see when personalization is complete.
No messages available to learn from (tap here to try again)
No contacts available to learn from (tap here to try again)
Writing style learned (tap here to learn again)
Last attempt failed %1$s. Tap to try again.
Last attempt failed. Tap to try again.
The servers are currently busy. Try later.
Clear all personalized language data collected to learn your writing style.
If you delete your personal data, it will no longer be available in Samsung keyboard.
Enter text by dragging your finger through all the letters in a word instead of tapping
Press and hold the voice key to select handwriting modes, clipboard and keyboard settings

The keyboard learns the words and phrases you use most often, making typing easier and improving accuracy over time. You can personalize word prediction by syncing with your Gmail, Facebook, Twitter or blogs.
Press and hold unwanted words in the predicted text box to remove them from the database
Wi-Fi network is not available. Connecting to mobile networks may result in additional charges depending on your payment plan.
Using mobile data when roaming may result in extra charges.
The selected languages support handwriting recognition. Tap Settings to set a handwriting recognition language.
The handwriting recognition language has been changed to %s. Tap Settings to change the handwriting recognition language.
Tap to keep the current text, or tap the space key to accept the predicted correction.
Touch and hold to view a list of symbols and options, then select one to assign as a shortcut.
Touch and hold this key to access a list of keyboard settings.
Press and hold this key to access a list of keyboard settings.
To use the keyboard easily with one hand, touch and hold this key, then select %s to turn on One-handed operation. You can also view the symbol list and assign shortcuts to symbols.
Swipe the space bar left or right to change language.
Double tap to change the input language.
To customize the tap and hold delay, tap and hold the box below, then release after the desired length of time. Tap Save to apply your changes.
Assign text shortcuts to number keys. This function is only available when using Qwerty keyboards.
Assign text shortcuts to the number keys.
Go to Settings > Language and input > Samsung keyboard settings > My hot keys to assign a shortcut to a number key.
Unable to enter characters using the dial button while input method is set as touch. Switch input method to dial button?
Unable to enter characters using touch input while input method is set as the dial button. Switch input method to touch?
This application is not supported in restricted profiles.
Adjust the size of the keyboard by dragging the handle at the top of the keyboard upwards or downwards.

"Adjust the size of the keyboard by dragging the handle at the top of the keyboard upwards or downwards.
The size can be set separately in both landscape and portrait view."
Create shortcuts for your frequently used phrases.
Create shortcuts for your frequently used phrases. Your preset phrases will be suggested in the predictive text area when you type their shortcuts.

Create shortcuts for your frequently used phrases. Your preset phrases will be suggested in the predictive text area when you type their shortcuts. For example, you could set “example@samsung.com” to be suggested whenever you type “email”.
Emojis and the following languages cannot be included in shortcut text: %s
This shortcut is already in use.
Unable to add the shortcut. The shortcut and the expanded phrase are the same.
Current keyboard language (%s) set as keyboard cover language.
Current keyboard languages (%s) set as keyboard cover languages.
The current keyboard language is not supported by the keyboard cover. The keyboard cover supports English by default.
The current keyboard languages are not supported by the keyboard cover. The keyboard cover supports English by default.
Some of your current keyboard languages are not supported by the keyboard cover. Select the languages you want to set as your keyboard cover languages from the list below.
Use only when connected via WLAN
Use when connected via any network
Show English characters as well when Chinese characters are entered.
"Show predicted contacts that start with the characters just tapped. Touch and hold contact's name to view their information."
Insert next word with space key
Check for updates automatically and download them using WLAN only.
Check for updates automatically and download them using WLAN only.
To update the database list, you will be connected via your mobile network. This may result in additional charges.
You will be connected to WLAN to update the database list.
Failed to connect to the server. Try again.
Failed to connect to the server. Try again.
This word database will be deleted.
Unable to connect to the network. Check your connection settings and try again.

"You can update the standard language data for improved predictions.
Samsung Chinese IME uses the language data provided by a third party service provider called Nuance Communications, Inc. By using updating language data feature, you agree to Nuance’s Terms and Conditions. Please note that updating language data feature requires network connections."
The device will use data through the currently connected WLAN network.
Tap the mic button to speak.
Tap the mic button to speak.
Unable to use voice input during calls.
WLAN is not turned on. To use the network, turn on WLAN.
Mobile data is off. Connect to a WLAN instead, or turn mobile data on and try again.

"Voice input uses voice recognition technologies provided by a third party service provider called Nuance Communications, Inc. Therefore, your voice information is inevitably stored in a server operated by Nuance(in the United States), and by using Voice input, you agree to Nuance's Terms and Conditions and Privacy Policy. Please note that Voice input requires network connections."
